education.universityName: University Complex, Islamic Azad University Central Tehran Branch
education.universityPara: I am currently a student at University Complex, Islamic Azad University Central Tehran Branch, where I have been studying since 2020. I am pursuing a degree in Bachelor of Engineering and have been working hard to expand my knowledge in the field. During my time at university, I have gained valuable skills such as Javascript, React, Python etc.
